titles: The Protestant's answer to The Catholick letter to the seeker, or, A vindication of the Protestant's answer, to the seeker's request
author: Williams, John, 1636?-1709.
publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Randal Taylor ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to John Williams. cf. NUC Pre-1956.
The "Protestant's answer" is Robert Nelson's Transubstantiation contrary to Scripture.
keywords: N. N. --  Catholic letter to the seeker.
Nelson, Robert, 1656-1715. --  Transubstantiation contrary to Scripture.
